course_description: This course develops techniques of street dance styles and examines hip-hop dance/culture. Students dive deeper into their artistry by engaging in the cultural laws of hip-hop--innovation, creativity, and individuality, to raze traditional hierarchical systems of power and promote respect for all.
prerequisites: DANC 222R or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2474, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Medina, Status: Closed
